```{r package_info, results='asis'}
library(knitr)
library(stringr)
if (exists("package_name")) {
  pkg_info <- packageDescription(package_name, fields = c('Package','Version','Title','Description','URL','Date/Publication'))
  # Title
  cat('**', pkg_info$Package,': ', pkg_info$Title, '** \n', sep='')
  # Description
  desc <- gsub("\\s+", " ", str_trim(pkg_info$Description))
  cat(desc,'\n', sep='')
  # all other fields
  pkg_info$Description <- NULL
  pkg_info$Title <- NULL
  l <- lapply(pkg_info, function(x) {return(x[[1]])})
  m <- unlist(l)
  df <- data.frame(A=m)
  kable(df, format = 'markdown')
}
```
